search.query: | tstats count from datamodel=Endpoint.Processes by Processes.process_exec Processes.process_path Processes.process Processes.parent_process_exec Processes.parent_process_path Processes.dest Processes.user _time summariesonly=false | rename Processes.* as * | lookup process_detections process_exec process_path process parent_process_exec parent_process_path user | rex field=process_exec "^(?<single>\w)\.\w+$" | eval analytic_id=if(isnull(single),analytic_id,53), score=if(isnull(single),score,50) | search score=* | eval ascore=mvzip(analytic_id, score,"|") | stats count by process_exec process_path process parent_process_exec parent_process_path dest user _time ascore | mvexpand ascore | rex field=ascore "(?<analytic_id>[^\|]+)\|(?<score>[^\|]+)" | stats values(score) as score by process_exec process_path process parent_process_exec parent_process_path dest user _time analytic_id | search score!=0
